Dreadplague grinned a bit before answering. If she wanted to become
agressive, she would gladly make her submit. But not for now.

Dreadplague: Many reasons. First, they fight against each other, so
why not let them tear themselves apart? Second, I have heard that the
Cosmic Rust is around. It's no good conquering if you die from it, no?

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "cardhead649" <cardhead649@y...> wrote:
> "My point is specialization!" Synergy jabs Dreaplague hard in the 
> chest with her cannon arm to emphasize herself.  And a particle beam 
> cannon pointed at your vital regions is a lot of emphasis.  "There's 
> a difference between breaking up barfights and fighting a war.  
> Anyway, if they're really that weak, why haven't you wiped them out 
> already, hmmm?"
> 
> --- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, "Nic" <Proudwing500k@h...> wrote:
> > Dreadplague frowns at her.
> > 
> > Dreadplague: Your point being? We're fighting Maxies and Preds. We
> > conquered their homeworld. The ones we have here aren't that bad.
